string.subscription:
If you do not understand this message or you believe it has been sent in error, kindly contact your council admin for clarification.

Please do not respond to this email address as it is unmonitored and will not receive a reply.

On behalf of the Lead Pastor,
Regards
The Administrator
First Love Center HQ
Accra

error.repeatingTreasurers: You cannot choose the same treasurer twice!
error.vacation_cannot_fill_service: You cannnot have service if you are on vacation. Please conntact your admin!
error.no_double_form_filling: You have already filled your service form this week!
error.no_duplicate_email_or_whatsapp: A member with this email address/whatsapp number already exists in the database
error.not_stream_service_day: You cannot fill this form today. It is not your stream service day

arrivalsSMS.less_than_8:
Proverbs 27:23 (KJV)

Be thou diligent to know the state of thy flocks,and look well to thy herds.

Today's bussing will not merit a top up. Your attendance was
arrivalsSMS.no_bussing_cost: We just counted your attendance. Since there is no cost to the church, you will not receive a top up today. Confirmed attendance is
arrivalsSMS.no_busses_to_pay_for: We just counted your attendance. Since you indicated that you didn't use a bus today, you  will not receive a top up. Confirmed attendance is
arrivalsSMS.normal_top_up_p1: We just counted your attendance at the terminal. You will receive a top up of
arrivalsSMS.normal_no_top_up: We just counted your attendance at the terminal. Today you bussed
arrivalsSMS.bacenta_demoted_to_ic_p1: Sorry to inform you that you have not met the quota of 8 for the last 4 weeks and your bacenta
arrivalsSMS.bacenta_demoted_to_ic_p2: is being demoted to Red status.
arrivalsSMS.bacenta_graduated_p2: has just graduated from Red status to Green status. Keep on working for the Lord!

equipment.notify_fellowship_leaders_sms:
Hi Fellowship Leader,
Note: Equipment Campaign Data Collection is ongoing. You are required to fill forms on the State of the Flock Admin Portal. Check your mail for more info.
equipment.notify_governorship_overseers_sms:
Hi CO,
Note: Equipment Campaign Data Collection is ongoing. You are required to fill forms on the State of the Flock Admin Portal. Check your mail for more info.

for equipment campaign.

We encourage you to ensure that all forms are filled by the deadline. Thank you!
